hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Spirit Temple Boss Key Chest: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Sun's Song#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Bottom of the Well# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #1# major item.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 2 Bottom

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Shadow Medallion#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #the Key#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the path to #the Key#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Sun's Song#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #Epona's Song#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #1# major item.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #0# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path of #time#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the final item you're looking for can be found somewhere in Hyrule.

KF (Outside Storms).text: Fingers-Mazda, the first thief in the world, stole fire from the gods.^But he was unable to fence it.&It was too hot.&He got really burned on that deal.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a spider behind a #gate in the Water Temple# holds #a Compass#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Zelda's Lullaby# can be found inside #the Temple of Time#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Ice Cavern# corridors ring with #the Bolero of Fire#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: Anything not saved will be lost.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is a #generic grotto#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Market#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides the #Lost Woods Stage#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Ganon's trials# protect the way to #King Dodongo#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #a Fire Temple Small Key Ring# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Boulder Maze Shortcut Chest

ToT (Right).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Game Key#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a #village well# leads to a small #Fairy Fountain#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #Magic Beans#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #a Green Rupee# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find a small #Fairy Fountain#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #cow in Gerudo Valley# gifts #the Water Temple Boss Key#.
